original_solution_mapping.L1: After the first segment, there are 100 - 10 = <<100-10=90>>90 racers left in the race.
original_solution_mapping.L2: After the second segment, 90 / 3 = <<90/3=30>>30 racers are eliminated.
original_solution_mapping.L3: This leaves 90 - 30 = <<90-30=60>>60 racers to compete in the third segment.
original_solution_mapping.L4: After the third segment, 60 / 2 = <<60/2=30>>30 more racers are eliminated.
original_solution_mapping.L5: This leaves 60 - 30 = <<60-30=30>>30 racers to run in the final section of the race.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5969.
    Returns: the number of racers who will run in the final section of the race.
    """
    # L1
    initial_racers = 100 # If 100 racers started the race
    eliminated_first_segment = 10 # 10 racers are eliminated after the first segment
    racers_after_first_segment = initial_racers - eliminated_first_segment

    # L2
    elimination_fraction_denominator_second = 3 # A third of the remaining racers
    eliminated_second_segment = racers_after_first_segment / elimination_fraction_denominator_second

    # L3
    racers_after_second_segment = racers_after_first_segment - eliminated_second_segment

    # L4
    elimination_fraction_denominator_third = 2 # Half of the remaining racers
    eliminated_third_segment = racers_after_second_segment / elimination_fraction_denominator_third

    # L5
    racers_final_segment = racers_after_second_segment - eliminated_third_segment

    # FA
    answer = racers_final_segment
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: After the first segment, there are {initial_racers} - {eliminated_first_segment} = <<{initial_racers}-{eliminated_first_segment}={racers_after_first_segment}>>{racers_after_first_segment} racers left in the race.

After the second segment, {racers_after_first_segment} / {elimination_fraction_denominator_second} = <<{racers_after_first_segment}/{elimination_fraction_denominator_second}={eliminated_second_segment}>>{eliminated_second_segment} racers are eliminated.

This leaves {racers_after_first_segment} - {eliminated_second_segment} = <<{racers_after_first_segment}-{eliminated_second_segment}={racers_after_second_segment}>>{racers_after_second_segment} racers to compete in the third segment.

After the third segment, {racers_after_second_segment} / {elimination_fraction_denominator_third} = <<{racers_after_second_segment}/{elimination_fraction_denominator_third}={eliminated_third_segment}>>{eliminated_third_segment} more racers are eliminated.

This leaves {racers_after_second_segment} - {eliminated_third_segment} = <<{racers_after_second_segment}-{eliminated_third_segment}={racers_final_segment}>>{racers_final_segment} racers to run in the final section of the race.
